title: IT60105: Information Systems Design - Quick Facts
text:
IT60105
Course name | INFORMATION SYSTEMS DESIGN
Offered by | Information Technology
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 4-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneGeneral methodologies for information systems design â Structured approach, Object-oriented approach, Prototyping, Rational Unified Process, CASE tools. Quality assurance in information systems â SEI CMM and ISO 9001. Coding methodologies â Standard coding techniques, Extreme programming. Testing â Different aspects of testing, unit and system testing, regression testing. Information system project management and Process metrics. Development of typical information systems â Finance and Accounting, Inventory Control, Ecommerce.
